Save Newton is a simple game but funny and make you addictive!

Use your bow shoot the falling apple, to save newton from apple's attack! 

Keep on touch left side of screen to hold bow, and release arrow when lift your finger, you can slide bow up and down when you hold it. You can switch your weapon by touching the weapon select button at the right bottom corner. Touch other part of screen should lead to game pause.

There are different weapon types and tools, you can enhancement your weapon in game store using the gold coin you got from shooting apple.
Normal apple, shoot it to earn score and gold coin.
Golden apple, shoot it to earn score and gold coin, and you can get ammunition of strong bow.
Green apple, shoot it to earn score and gold coin, and you can get ammunition of weak bow, score will be double when you shoot apple with weak bow.
Gravity apple, it can make the gravity lower to let every apple fall slowly in few seconds.
Use these powers to earn highest score! Post score online to compete with other players all over the world!\n\nBe careful! DO NOT hit Newton!
You have unlock achievement %s. You can post it online later.
